TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TrackingProfile extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 定義根工作流程執行個體的可能執行路徑中要使用的點，而且要讓追蹤服務知道這個點。

span.span: Defines points of interest in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance about which a tracking service should be notified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流程執行個體在執行期間會發出追蹤事件到執行階段追蹤基礎結構。During its run time, a workflow instance emits tracking events to the runtime tracking infrastructure. 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會使用 篩選這些追蹤事件，然後將根據此篩選將追蹤記錄傳回至追蹤服務。The runtime tracking infrastructure uses a to filter these tracking events and returns tracking records based on this filtering to a tracking service. 可篩選的追蹤事件有三種：活動狀態事件、工作流程狀態事件和使用者事件。There are three kinds of tracking events that can be filtered: activity status events, workflow status events, and user events. 您可以加入 物件至 屬性以比對特定活動狀態事件、加入 物件至 屬性以比對特定工作流程狀態事件，以及加入 物件至 屬性以比對特定使用者事件。You can add objects to the property to match specific activity status events; objects to the property to match specific workflow status events; and objects to the property to match specific user events. 如果有相符的追蹤點，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會將與追蹤事件關聯的資料，透過與該服務關聯的 傳回至追蹤服務。When a track point is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure returns the data associated with the tracking event to the tracking service over the associated with that service. 視符合的追蹤點類型而定，會傳回 、 或 中的資料。The data is returned in either an , a , or a depending on the type of track point that was matched. 追蹤服務會實作抽象 類別中的方法，為執行階段追蹤基礎結構提供功能，使其能夠要求與服務關聯的 ，以及與特定工作流程執行個體或特定工作流程類型關聯的 。A tracking service implements the methods in the abstract class to provide the functionality for the runtime tracking infrastructure to request a associated with the service, and a associated with a particular workflow instance or with a particular workflow type. 追蹤服務也必須實作抽象 類別，以提供執行階段追蹤基礎結構可用來傳送追蹤記錄的通道。A tracking service must also implement the abstract class to provide the channel over which the runtime tracking infrastructure can send tracking records. 當追蹤服務傳回追蹤設定檔物件至執行階段時，工作流程便開始執行，而追蹤設定檔也會序列化。When the tracking service returns a tracking profile object to the runtime, the workflow starts to execute, and the tracking profile is serialized. 如果追蹤設定檔的序列化失敗，則會引發例外狀況至工作流程執行個體。If the serialization of the tracking profile fails, an exception is raised to the workflow instance. 如果未處理例外狀況，工作流程執行個體會終止。If the exception is not handled, the workflow instance is terminated. 在將追蹤設定檔傳遞到執行階段之前，可使用 屬性加以驗證。The tracking profile can be validated before passing it to the runtime using the property. 您可將 序列化為 XML，做法是使用 ，它會根據 來格式化 XML。A can be serialized to XML by using the , which formats the XML according to the . 這提供了一種方便的格式，可用於儲存設定檔，並且以非程式設計的方法撰寫設定檔。This provides a convenient format for profile storage and for authoring a profile in a non-programmatic manner. 例如，SQL 追蹤服務會儲存其追蹤設定檔的序列化版本，任何根據 類別所建立的追蹤服務也會這麼做。For example, the SQL Tracking Service stores serialized versions of its tracking profiles, as will any tracking service you create based on the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 建構函式建立 ，並使用物件的屬性協助追蹤工作流程的執行。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor and use the object's properties to help track the execution of a workflow. 此範例程式碼會使用 、 和 屬性。The example code uses the , , and properties. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜使用 SQLTrackingService 查詢 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 查詢使用 SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21)。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21). summary.span: 初始化 的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會初始化空的 。The constructor initializes an empty . 您可以加入追蹤點至 、 和 以設定 。You can add track points to , , and to configure the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 建構函式建立 ，並使用物件的屬性協助追蹤工作流程的執行。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor and use the object's properties to help track the execution of a workflow. 此範例程式碼會使用 、 和 屬性。The example code uses the , , and properties. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜使用 SQLTrackingService 查詢 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 查詢使用 SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21)。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ActivityTrackPoints As ActivityTrackPointCollection

summary.span: 取得執行階段追蹤基礎結構用來篩選活動狀態事件的活動追蹤點集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of activity track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter activity status events.

value.span: ，可指定工作流程執行個體中的點，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會傳送這些點的 至追蹤服務。

span.span: An that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send an to the tracking service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每當活動執行個體的 變更時，工作流程執行個體都會發出活動狀態事件到執行階段追蹤基礎結構。A workflow instance emits activity status events to the runtime tracking infrastructure whenever the of an activity instance changes. 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會使用 屬性篩選這些活動狀態事件，以判斷何時傳送 至追蹤服務。The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the property to filter these activity status events to determine when to send an to the tracking service. 您可以加入 至 屬性中，以指定您所需要的點；這些點位於工作流程執行個體的可能執行路徑中，而且您想要傳送這個執行個體的 。You can add an to the property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want the runtime infrastructure to send an . 不會實際定義工作流程執行個體中的實體點，而會定義一組比對參數，讓執行階段追蹤基礎結構可用來比對應傳送之 的活動狀態事件。An does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines a set of match parameters that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match an activity status event for which it should send an . 因此，在工作流程執行個體的存留期間內，可以多次比對相同的 。Therefore, the same can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance. 也可以指定要從工作流程執行個體中擷取，然後在 中傳回的資料。An can also specify data to be extracted from the workflow instance and returned in the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 建構函式建立 ，並使用物件的屬性協助追蹤工作流程的執行。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor and use the object's properties to help track the execution of a workflow. 此範例程式碼會使用 、 和 屬性。The example code uses the , , and properties. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜使用 SQLTrackingService 查詢 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 查詢使用 SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21)。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserTrackPoints As UserTrackPointCollection

summary.span: 取得執行階段追蹤基礎結構用來篩選使用者事件的使用者追蹤點集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of user track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter user events.

value.span: ，可指定工作流程執行個體中的點，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會傳送這些點的 至追蹤服務。

span.span: A that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send a to the tracking service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流程設計工具或活動設計工具可使用 、、 或 ，指揮工作流程或活動在工作流程執行期間的特定點上發出資料至執行階段追蹤基礎結構。A workflow designer or an activity designer can use , , , or to instrument a workflow or an activity to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure at specific points during the execution of a workflow. 這類情況稱為使用者事件，而發出的資料則稱為使用者資料。Such an occurrence is called a user event and the data emitted is called user data. 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會使用 屬性篩選使用者事件，以判斷何時傳送 至追蹤服務。The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the property to filter user events to determine when to send a to the tracking service. 您可以加入 至 屬性中，以指定您所需要的點；這些點位於工作流程執行個體的可能執行路徑中，而且您想要傳送這個執行個體的 。You can add a to the property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want a sent. 不會實際定義工作流程執行個體中的實體點，而會定義一組比對參數，讓執行階段追蹤基礎結構可用來比對使用者事件。A does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines a set of match parameters that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match user events. 因此，在工作流程執行個體的存留期間內，可以多次比對相同的 。Therefore, the same can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance. 執行階段追蹤基礎結構一律會傳回與 中符合的 關聯的使用者資料，但 也可以指定要從工作流程執行個體中擷取，然後在追蹤記錄中傳回的資料。The runtime tracking infrastructure always returns the user data associated with a matched in the , but a can also specify data to be extracted from the workflow instance and returned in the tracking record.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Version ^ Version { Version ^ get(); void set(Version ^ value); };
member this.Version : Version with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定追蹤設定檔的版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the version of the tracking profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於設定檔的語意會在工作流程執行階段引擎中進行快取動作，所以如果您變更 的內容，則必須更新 。Because of the semantics of profile caching in the workflow runtime engine, if you change the contents of a you must update . 如果您未更新，即使已藉由呼叫 傳回您已更新的 ，或是在與 事件關聯的 中傳送它，工作流程執行階段引擎可能還是不會載入它。If you do not, your updated may not be loaded by the workflow runtime engine, even if it is returned by a call to , or sent in the associated with a event. 因此，為了確保工作流程執行階段引擎載入更新的 ，您應該變更 的 。Therefore, to ensure that the updated is loaded by the workflow runtime engine, you should change the for the . 然後，您可以明確呼叫任何適當工作流程執行個體上的 ，或者是視您的實作而定，依賴追蹤服務對工作流程執行階段引擎通知變更。You can then explicitly call on any appropriate workflow instances, or, depending on your implementation, you can rely on the tracking service to inform the workflow runtime engine of the change. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 建構函式建立 ，並使用物件的屬性協助追蹤工作流程的執行。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor and use the object's properties to help track the execution of a workflow. 此範例程式碼會使用 、 和 屬性。The example code uses the , , and properties. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜使用 SQLTrackingService 查詢 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 查詢使用 SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21)。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WorkflowTrackPoints As WorkflowTrackPointCollection

summary.span: 取得執行階段追蹤基礎結構用來篩選工作流程狀態事件的工作流程追蹤點集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of workflow track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter workflow status events.

value.span: ，可指定工作流程執行個體中的點，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會傳送這些點的 至追蹤服務。

span.span: A that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send a to the tracking service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每當發生 時，工作流程執行個體都會發出工作流程狀態事件到執行階段追蹤基礎結構，表示工作流程執行個體的狀態已變更。A workflow instance emits workflow status events to the runtime tracking infrastructure whenever a occurs indicating that the status of a workflow instance has changed. 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會使用 屬性篩選這些工作流程狀態事件，以判斷何時傳送 至追蹤服務。The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the property to filter these workflow status events to determine when to send a to the tracking service. 您可以加入 至 屬性中，以指定您所需要的點；這些點位於工作流程執行個體的可能執行路徑中，而且您想要傳送這個執行個體的 。You can add a to the property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want a sent. 不會實際定義工作流程執行個體中的實體點，而會定義一個或多個 值，讓執行階段追蹤基礎結構用來比對工作流程狀態事件。A does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines one or more values that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match workflow status events. 因此，在工作流程執行個體的存留期間內，可以多次比對相同的 。Therefore, the same can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance. 也可以指定要在 中傳回的任何附註。A can also specify any annotations to be returned in the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 建構函式建立 ，並使用物件的屬性協助追蹤工作流程的執行。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor and use the object's properties to help track the execution of a workflow. 此範例程式碼會使用 、 和 屬性。The example code uses the , , and properties. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜使用 SQLTrackingService 查詢 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 查詢使用 SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21)。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21).
